price: (54) And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Do you commit immorality[1081] while you are seeing?[1082]
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes:
[1081]- Homosexual acts.
[1082]- i.e., openly.  Another meaning is "...while you are aware [that it is wrong]."
